title: Scorecard: 27.8% ❌
content:
Project scorecard generated.

## Blockers

## Recommendations

- [high] CodeQL: Enable CodeQL workflow for automated security scanning
- [high] Testing: Fix failing tests and increase coverage to 30%
- [medium] Performance: Enable: mcp_connection_pooling, async_operations
- [medium] Tasks: Complete pending tasks to show progress
